channel.title: sabbatical on Teach Me To Code
channel.description: Recent content in sabbatical on Teach Me To Code

item.title: Google -> Sabbatical
item.description: After 6 years at Google, I resigned this past March. Rather than explaining why I left, I think it’s easier to explain why I stayed as long as I did. To begin with, I never aspired to work at a big tech company. Because I don’t have any formal computer science education, I assumed that big tech companies would never hire me. Once I was hired by Google, I saw it as a big experiment.
